author: serge
msg: Patch from Oki Dz.  Uses Buffered streams, adds license, and adds a delete to the finalize of this object, to reduce file usage during JVM existance (rather than waiting until JVM exited)

author: serge
msg: Turned off EHLO support in remote delivery to avoid 250 OK messages.

msg: Patch to force the use of english names of months and days.
